text: The second season from the anime series Naruto is directed by Hayato Date, and produced by Studio pierrot and TV Tokyo. Based on Masashi Kishimoto's manga series, the season follows Naruto Uzumaki succeeding the ChÅ«nin Exams only to discover invasion of the Leaf Village. The second season aired on November 12,2003 ==Episode list== Category:Naruto
